Constant.name: banner_img
Constant.value: 'frame_half_top_' .. (state.is_weapon and 'yellow' or (state.is_ability and 'lightblue' or (state.is_item and 'green' or (state.is_artifact and 'red' or (state.is_evolution and 'purple')))))

Constant.name: color
Constant.value: (state.skill_type == 'Active') and state.active_color or (state.skill_type == 'Passive') and state.passive_color or state.unique_color
